title: Our Work
description: Case studies in time, focus, and operational cadence.
imageAlt: Abstract clock hands moving in harmony, representing synchronized workflows. Photo by Scott Webb on Unsplash.

projects.title: TimeSync Platform
projects.description: Built a real-time scheduling platform that coordinates distributed teams across 12 time zones with intelligent conflict detection and automated rescheduling.
projects.imageAlt: Digital clock interface showing multiple time zones. Photo by Lukas from Pexels.

projects.title: FocusFlow Workflow
projects.description: Designed and implemented a deep work workflow system that blocks distraction periods, tracks focus metrics, and generates productivity insights for creative professionals.
projects.imageAlt: Person working focused on laptop in minimal workspace. Photo by Andrea Piacquadio from Pexels.

projects.title: CalendarOps Dashboard
projects.description: Developed an enterprise calendar operations platform that manages executive schedules, resource allocation, and meeting analytics with automated reporting and forecasting.
projects.imageAlt: Business professionals reviewing calendar and data on tablets. Photo by Christina Morillo from Unsplash.

projects.title: Pulse Notification System
projects.description: Created an intelligent notification system that delivers time-sensitive alerts to medical staff while respecting shift patterns, break times, and patient priority levels.
projects.imageAlt: Medical professionals using tablets in modern hospital setting. Photo by Hush Naidoo Jade Photography from Unsplash.

projects.title: RetailRhythm Scheduler
projects.description: Built an AI-powered staff scheduling system that predicts peak hours, optimizes shift assignments, and reduces labor costs while maintaining customer service standards.
projects.imageAlt: Retail store employees organized and working efficiently. Photo by Karolina Grabowska from Pexels.

projects.title: MeetingMinder Assistant
projects.description: Developed a meeting management tool that automatically captures action items, tracks follow-ups, and integrates with project management tools to ensure nothing falls through the cracks.
projects.imageAlt: Team having productive meeting with notes and action items. Photo by Christina Morillo from Pexels.
